alert.note: Alert for McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Itawamba, Tishomingo, Prentiss, Alcorn and southwestern McNairy Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Theo to near Burton to 7 miles south of Red Bay. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, Red Bay, Iuka, Big Hill Pond State Park, Tishomingo State Park, Belmont, Burnsville, Jumpertown, Tremont, Glen, Tishomingo, Thrashers, Fairview, Theo, Midway, Hinkle, Burton, Wheeler and Leedy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
